verbs.description: [ARG0: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] [V: travels] [ARG1: with an elite group of bodyguards who jog in formation around his car] . The men are selected from army conscripts based on their physical appearances and abilities . Kim and President Donald Trump will be heavily guarded while they meet in Singapore on Tuesday .
